reviewText: Great stories. Almost as good as Charles Dickens.

As a new fan of Catherine Cookson, I purchased this collection after buying a few seperately.  Loved everyone one of these stories...coouldn't be more real, more enjoyable, an absolute favorite. Will rewatch again and again...loved them!

These movies are so true to life, I cry, laugh, cringe, shiver. They seem so real , no matter what year it is. People back then act the same way they act today. They lie, cheat, steal, and kill. They love , forgive, are honest, just like today. I give most of them 5 stars
Great movies.  Everyone of the movies were enjoyable to watch.  Couldn't stop watching.  Will watch a 2nd time. A must HAVE.
